Termitron/Windlord/Nightlight::

"NOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!!!!" cried Termitron "YOU'LL PAY IT WITH YOU LIFE 
THAT, ENEMY!!!!!"

Before Termitron could do something Windlord ran and he tried to hold 
Termitron. "STOP, TERMITRON STOP!!!!" screamed Windlord "DON'T DO 
IT!!!"

"HE TRIED KILL THE QUEEN!!!!!! HE WON'T LIVE!!!!!!" screamed 
Termitron. "HOW CAN YOU SAY THAT YOU'RE ROYALTY'S FRIEND IF YOU DON'T 
PROTECT HER!!!!??????"

"WE'RE DOING THAT, TERMITRON!!!!" replied Windlord, and the hawk 
added "AEROTAUR, CAPTURE GRAMPS AND LOCK HIM DOWN WHERE HE CAN'T HURT 
NO ONE!!!"

"BUT QUEEN MUST BE AVENGED!!!!" yelled Termitron.

"Ter...mi..tron, Trinity... she... " said weakly Nightlight "Leave 
her with Technosis... "

"i CAN'T LEAVE YOU!!!!" cried Termitron.

"PLEASEEEE!!!"  begged Nighlight "I trut you... I'll be ok..."

That conviced Termitron, Windlord freed him. Termitron who walked 
towards a corritor, he stopped and looking Gramps "IF YOU TOUCH HER 
i'LL KILL YOU!!!!!! I PROMISE IT!!!!"

He left the place. Windlord moved and where Nightlight was.
